* DukeExceptions is the super class of all exceptions in Duke system
* EmptyContentException is thrown when the task content is empty
* InvalidCommandException is thrown when the input command is invalid.
* InvalidTimeException is thrown when the input time format is wrong
* NoSuchTaskException is thrown when the target task doesn't exist
